verses.verse: וַיְשִׁבֵנִי֮ <WH7725> Afterward he brought me again אֶל־ <WH413> to פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> unto the door הַבַּיִת֒ <WH1004> of the house וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold מַ֣יִם <WH4325> and behold waters יֹצְאִ֗ים <WH3318> issued out מִתַּ֨חַת <WH8478> under מִפְתַּ֤ן <WH4670> from under the threshold הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the house קָדִ֔ימָה <WH6921> eastward כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פְנֵ֥י <WH6440> for the forefront הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> of the house קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> [stood toward] the east וְהַמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> and the waters יֹרְדִ֗ים <WH3381> came down מִתַּ֜חַת <WH8478> under מִכֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> side הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the house הַיְמָנִ֔ית <WH3233> from under from the right מִנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> at the south לַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <WH4196> [side] of the altar

וַיּוֹצִאֵנִי֮ <WH3318> Then brought he me out דֶּֽרֶךְ־ <WH1870> of the way שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> of the gate צָפוֹנָה֒ <WH6828> northward וַיְסִבֵּ֙נִי֙ <WH5437> and led me about דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way ח֔וּץ <WH2351> without unto the utter אֶל־ <WH413> about שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> gate הַח֔וּץ <WH2351> to the outer דֶּ֖רֶךְ <WH1870> by the way הַפּוֹנֶ֣ה <WH6437> that looketh קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> eastward וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> and behold מַ֣יִם <WH4325> waters מְפַכִּ֔ים <WH6349> unstable מִן־ <WH4480> at הַכָּתֵ֖ף <WH3802> side הַיְמָנִֽית׃ <WH3233> on the right

בְּצֵאת־ <WH3318> went forth הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And when the man קָדִ֖ים <WH6921> eastward וְקָ֣ו <WH6957> that had the line בְּיָד֑וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וַיָּ֤מָד <WH4058> he measured אֶ֙לֶף֙ <WH505> a thousand בָּֽאַמָּ֔ה <WH520> cubits וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֥נִי <WH5674> and he brought me through בַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> the waters מֵ֥י <WH4325> the waters אָפְסָֽיִם׃ <WH657> [were] to the ankles

וַיָּ֣מָד <WH4058> Again he measured אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> a thousand וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֥נִי <WH5674> and brought me through בַמַּ֖יִם <WH4325> the waters מַ֣יִם <WH4325> the waters בִּרְכָּ֑יִם <WH1290> [were] to the knees וַיָּ֣מָד <WH4058> Again he measured אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> a thousand וַיַּעֲבִרֵ֖נִי <WH5674> and brought me through מֵ֥י <WH4325> the waters מָתְנָֽיִם׃ <WH4975> [were] to the loins

וַיָּ֣מָד <WH4058> Afterward he measured אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> a thousand נַ֕חַל <WH5158> [and it was] a river אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> that I could לַעֲבֹ֑ר <WH5674> not pass over כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָא֤וּ <WH1342> were risen הַמַּ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> for the waters מֵ֣י <WH4325> waters שָׂ֔חוּ <WH7813> to swim in נַ֖חַל <WH5158> a river אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> could יֵעָבֵֽר׃ <WH5674> that could not be passed over

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלַ֖י <WH413> have you הֲרָאִ֣יתָ <WH7200> hast thou seen בֶן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of man וַיּוֹלִכֵ֥נִי <WH1980> he וַיְשִׁבֵ֖נִי <WH7725> me and caused me to return שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> to the brink הַנָּֽחַל׃ <WH5158> of the river

בְּשׁוּבֵ֕נִי <WH7725> Now when I had returned וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold אֶל־ <WH413> on שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> behold at the bank הַנַּ֔חַל <WH5158> of the river עֵ֖ץ <WH6086> trees רַ֣ב <WH7227> many מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> [were] very מִזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> the one וּמִזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> side

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> toward הַמַּ֤יִם <WH4325> he unto me These waters הָאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> These יוֹצְאִ֗ים <WH3318> issue out אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַגְּלִילָה֙ <WH1552> country הַקַּדְמוֹנָ֔ה <WH6930> toward the east וְיָרְד֖וּ <WH3381> and go down עַל־ <WH5921> into הָֽעֲרָבָ֑ה <WH6160> into the desert וּבָ֣אוּ <WH935> and go הַיָּ֔מָּה <WH3220> into the sea אֶל־ <WH413> toward הַיָּ֥מָּה <WH3220> into the sea הַמּֽוּצָאִ֖ים <WH3318> [which being] brought forth [וְנִרְפְּאוּ כ] (וְנִרְפּ֥וּ <WH7495> cure ק) הַמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> the waters

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> will come כָל־ <WH3605> every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> And it shall come to pass [that] every thing חַיָּ֣ה ׀ <WH2416> that liveth אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִשְׁרֹ֡ץ <WH8317> which moveth אֶ֣ל <WH413> in כָּל־ <WH3605> every אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which יָב֨וֹא <WH935> shall come שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there נַחֲלַ֙יִם֙ <WH5158> whithersoever the rivers יִֽחְיֶ֔ה <WH2421> shall live וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> will come הַדָּגָ֖ה <WH1710> multitude of fish רַבָּ֣ה <WH7227> great מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> and there shall be a very כִּי֩ <WH3588> for בָ֨אוּ <WH935> shall come שָׁ֜מָּה <WH8033> there הַמַּ֣יִם <WH4325> because these waters הָאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> these וְיֵרָֽפְאוּ֙ <WH7495> thither for they shall be healed וָחָ֔י <WH2425> and every thing shall live כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> everything אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יָ֥בוֹא <WH935> cometh שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> there הַנָּֽחַל׃ <WH5158> whither the river

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> will come [יַעַמְדוּ כ] (עָמְד֨וּ <WH5975> abide ק) עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> beside דַּוָּגִ֗ים <WH1728> And it shall come to pass [that] the fishers מֵעֵ֥ין גֶּ֙דִי֙ <WH5872> upon it from Engedi וְעַד־ <WH5704> against עֵ֣ין עֶגְלַ֔יִם <WH5882> even unto Eneglaim מִשְׁט֥וֹחַ <WH4894> they shall be a [place] to spread forth לַֽחֲרָמִ֖ים <WH2764> nets יִהְי֑וּ <WH1961> will come לְמִינָה֙ <WH4327> shall be according to their kinds תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> will come דְגָתָ֔ם <WH1710> their fish כִּדְגַ֛ת <WH1710> as the fish הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of the great רַבָּ֥ה <WH7227> many מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> exceeding

[בִּצֹּאתֹו כ] (בִּצֹּאתָ֧יו <WH1207> swamp ק) וּגְבָאָ֛יו <WH1360> thereof and the marishes וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> will not יֵרָפְא֖וּ <WH7495> thereof shall not be healed לְמֶ֥לַח <WH4417> to salt נִתָּֽנוּ׃ <WH5414> they shall be given

וְעַל־ <WH5921> By הַנַּ֣חַל <WH5158> And by the river יַעֲלֶ֣ה <WH5927> thereof on this side and on that side shall grow עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂפָת֣וֹ <WH8193> upon the bank מִזֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> one וּמִזֶּ֣ה ׀ <WH2088> side כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֵֽץ־ <WH6086> all trees מַ֠אֲכָל <WH3978> for meat לֹא־ <WH3808> will not יִבּ֨וֹל <WH5034> shall not fade עָלֵ֜הוּ <WH5929> whose leaf וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> will not יִתֹּ֣ם <WH8552> thereof be consumed פִּרְי֗וֹ <WH6529> neither shall the fruit לָֽחֳדָשָׁיו֙ <WH2320> according to his months יְבַכֵּ֔ר <WH1069> it shall bring forth new fruit כִּ֣י <WH3588> because מֵימָ֔יו <WH4325> because their waters מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּקְדָּ֖שׁ <WH4720> of the sanctuary הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like יֽוֹצְאִ֑ים <WH3318> they issued out [וְהָיוּ כ] (וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become ק) פִרְיוֹ֙ <WH6529> and the fruit לְמַֽאֲכָ֔ל <WH3978> thereof shall be for meat וְעָלֵ֖הוּ <WH5929> and the leaf לִתְרוּפָֽה׃ <WH8644> thereof for medicine ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD גֵּ֤ה <WH1454> This גְבוּל֙ <WH1366> [shall be] the border אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תִּתְנַחֲל֣וּ <WH5157> whereby ye shall inherit אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> the land לִשְׁנֵ֥י <WH8147> two עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> ten שִׁבְטֵ֣י <WH7626> tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph חֲבָלִֽים׃ <WH2256> [shall have two] portions

וּנְחַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH5157> And ye shall inherit אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> it one כְּאָחִ֔יו <WH251> as well as another אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <WH5375> [concerning] the which I lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֔י <WH3027> mine hand לְתִתָּ֖הּ <WH5414> to give לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> it unto your fathers וְנָ֨פְלָ֜ה <WH5307> shall fall הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> and this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise לָכֶ֖ם בְּנַחֲלָֽה׃ <WH5159> unto you for inheritance

וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> This גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> And this [shall be] the border הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land לִפְאַ֨ת <WH6285> side צָפ֜וֹנָה <WH6828> toward the north מִן־ <WH4480> at הַיָּ֧ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֛וֹל <WH1419> from the great הַדֶּ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the way חֶתְלֹ֖ן <WH2855> of Hethlon לְב֥וֹא <WH935> as men go צְדָֽדָה׃ <WH6657> to Zedad

חֲמָ֤ת ׀ <WH2574> Hamath בֵּר֙וֹתָה֙ <WH1268> Berothah סִבְרַ֔יִם <WH5453> Sibraim אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which בֵּין־ <WH996> is between גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> which [is] between the border דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וּבֵ֖ין <WH996> is between גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> and the border חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hamath חָצֵר֙ הַתִּיכ֔וֹן <WH2694> Hazarhatticon אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which אֶל־ <WH413> about גְּב֥וּל <WH1366> which [is] by the coast חַוְרָֽן׃ <WH2362> of Hauran

וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> shall extend גְב֜וּל <WH1366> And the border מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיָּ֗ם <WH3220> from the sea חֲצַ֤ר עֵינוֹן֙ <WH2703> shall be Hazarenan גְּב֣וּל <WH1366> the border דַּמֶּ֔שֶׂק <WH1834> of Damascus וְצָפ֥וֹן ׀ <WH6828> and the north צָפ֖וֹנָה <WH6828> northward וּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> and the border חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> of Hamath וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> פְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side צָפֽוֹן׃ <WH6828> And [this is] the north

וּפְאַ֣ת <WH6285> side קָדִ֡ים <WH6921> And the east מִבֵּ֣ין <WH996> from חַוְרָ֣ן <WH2362> Hauran וּמִבֵּין־ <WH996> and from דַּמֶּשֶׂק֩ <WH1834> Damascus וּמִבֵּ֨ין <WH996> and from הַגִּלְעָ֜ד <WH1568> Gilead וּמִבֵּ֨ין <WH996> and from אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> the land יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel הַיַּרְדֵּ֔ן <WH3383> [by] Jordan מִגְּב֛וּל <WH1366> from the border עַל־ <WH5921> and הַיָּ֥ם <WH3220> sea הַקַּדְמוֹנִ֖י <WH6931> unto the east תָּמֹ֑דּוּ <WH4058> ye shall measure וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> פְּאַ֥ת <WH6285> side קָדִֽימָה׃ <WH6921> And [this is] the east

וּפְאַת֙ <WH6285> side נֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> And the south תֵּימָ֔נָה <WH8486> southward מִתָּמָ֗ר <WH8559> from Tamar עַד־ <WH5704> far מֵי֙ <WH4325> [even] to the waters מְרִיב֣וֹת <WH4808> provocation קָדֵ֔שׁ <WH6946> [in] Kadesh נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5158> the river אֶל־ <WH413> about הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֑וֹל <WH1419> to the great וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side תֵּימָ֖נָה <WH8486> And [this is] the south נֶֽגְבָּה׃ <WH5045> southward

וּפְאַת־ <WH6285> side יָם֙ <WH3220> The west הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> sea הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> also [shall be] the great מִגְּב֕וּל <WH1366> from the border עַד־ <WH5704> to a point נֹ֖כַח <WH5227> over against לְב֣וֹא <WH935> till a man come חֲמָ֑ת <WH2574> Hamath זֹ֖את <WH2063> likewise פְּאַת־ <WH6285> side יָֽם׃ <WH3220> This [is] the west

וְחִלַּקְתֶּ֞ם <WH2505> So shall ye divide אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֧רֶץ <WH776> this land הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> likewise לָכֶ֖ם לְשִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> unto you according to the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהָיָ֗ה <WH1961> become תַּפִּ֣לוּ <WH5307> And it shall come to pass [that] ye shall divide אוֹתָהּ֮ <WH853> בְּנַחֲלָה֒ <WH5159> it by lot for an inheritance לָכֶ֗ם וּלְהַגֵּרִים֙ <WH1616> unto you and to the strangers הַגָּרִ֣ים <WH1481> that sojourn בְּתוֹכְכֶ֔ם <WH8432> among אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הוֹלִ֥דוּ <WH3205> you which shall beget בָנִ֖ים <WH1121> children בְּתֽוֹכְכֶ֑ם <WH8432> among וְהָי֣וּ <WH1961> become לָכֶ֗ם כְּאֶזְרָח֙ <WH249> you and they shall be unto you as born בִּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> among the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אִתְּכֶם֙ <WH854> by יִפְּל֣וּ <WH5307> they shall have בְנַחֲלָ֔ה <WH5159> inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> with you among שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become בַשֵּׁ֔בֶט <WH7626> And it shall come to pass [that] in what tribe אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which גָּ֥ר <WH1481> sojourneth הַגֵּ֖ר <WH1616> the stranger אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> for שָׁ֚ם <WH8033> there תִּתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> there shall ye give נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> [him] his inheritance נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD ס
